casebody.data:
WHITT
v.
Harris TEETER. No. 416A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2005. Lucretia D. Guia, Winston-Salem, for Harris Teeter, Inc. Harvey L. Kennedy, Annie Brown Kennedy, Winston-Salem, for Wendy Whitt. Julianna C. Theall, Greensboro, for Shultz. J. Michael McGuinness, Elizabethtown, Grady K. Dukes, Burton Craige, Raleigh, Suzanne Reynolds, Professor of Law, Winston-Salem, Charles E. Daye, for Asso. of Women Attorneys, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of March 2005 by Plaintiff to be allowed to Withdraw Plaintiff-Appellee's Motion to Strike Defendant-Appellant's Reply Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2005."
